sentences.literal: Shang Zhang Zuo E second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘三十四，小餘一百一十三；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder thirty four, small remainder one hundred thirteen;
Large remainder forty five, no small remainder;

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘二十八，小餘四百六十一；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder twenty eight, small remainder four hundred sixty one;
Large remainder fifty, small remainder eight;
Duameng Da Yuan Xian fourth year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘五十二，小餘三百六十八；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty two, small remainder three hundred sixty eight;
Large remainder fifty five, small remainder sixteen;
You Zhao Kun Dun fifth year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘四十六，小餘七百一十六；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder forty six, small remainder seven hundred sixteen;
No large remainder, small remainder twenty four;
Qiang Wu Chi Fen Ruo sixth year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘四十一，小餘一百二十四；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder forty one, small remainder one hundred twenty four;
Large remainder six, no small remainder;
